channel.title: Helm on Jeremy Mathevet
channel.description: Recent content in Helm on Jeremy Mathevet

item.title: Create Your Own VPN in the Cloud
item.description: For a lot of reasons, VPNs can be useful. Personally, as an expat, I am regularly facing geo-resctricted video content. It can be very frustrating at times. Subscribing to a VPN provider could be a solution, however I always found it a bit expensive for my usage. Since I’m renting a dedicated server in France, I was using it for years as a SOCKS proxy, when needed. However, I now miss some contents from another country I lived in: the UK.
